oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Greetings from Memphis" Postcard Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Exterior Side One: "Greetings from Memphis Tenn. -- Roll That Cotton Bale" -- Handwritten: "Miss Betty Lou Godfrey - Sweet Home - Ark." -- Exterior Side Two: "Skyline View of Memphis on the Mississippi River" image.

Interior: "Memphis, Tennessee" introduction; "Sunset on the Mississippi River" image; "Statue of General Nathan Bedford Forrest, Forrest Park" image; "Harahan Bridge at West Memphis, Tennessee, Crossing the Mississippi River" image; "U.S. Federal Building and Post Office" image; "Pink Palace in Chickasaw Gardens" image; "Main Street" image; "Entrance to Memphis Zoo" image; "Baptist Memorial Hospital" image; "Freight Barges on Mississippi River, Approaching Memphis" image; "Cotton on the Levee" image; "Brooks Memorial Art Gallery" image; "Shelby County Court House" image; "Famous Court Square" image; "University of Tennessee School of Medicine" image; "Sterick Building" image; "Cabin in a Cotton Field" image;
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: downtown; bridges; hospitals; parks; Mississippi River; buildings; streets; universities; Memphis Zoo;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Bluff City News Co., Memphis, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: A "Colourpicture" Publication, Cambridge, Mass.; Collection processed by Angela Price; digitized by S. Frierson;
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: SFPost082, SFPost083, SFPost084, SFPost085, SFPost086, SFPost087, SFPost088, SFPost089, SFPost090
